cast.name: 杰拉德·迈克索利 Gerard McSorley

introduction: The tide is slowly coming in and Finn (Dylan Moran),a worthless low-rent hood, has been dropped on an isolated beach,his feet set in concrete.Finn's misery is compounded when Jack (Gerard McSorley), a short,hard and edgy minor gangster responsible for his predicament,lands a few yards away, feet also set in concrete.Rather than helping each other the two men bicker and squander their chances of survival when it presents itself in the form of a series of colourful passers by.When the obstinately optimistic Jack eventually drowns,Finn tearfully accepts his fate.Will the late arrival of a refugee on a brightly coloured inflatable dinosaur stop the inevitable?
